title: Hilton Worldwide expands its Chicagoland presence
text:
Hilton Worldwide expands its Chicagoland presence Adv: Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville Adv: 
NAPERVILLE, IL & MCLEAN, VA - Embassy Suites by Hilton, Hilton Worldwide’s global brand of upscale, all-suite hotels, announced today the opening of its newest property, Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville. The first newly-built hotel in Naperville in more than eight years, this 168 all-suite hotel offers guests an excellent central location. Conveniently located close to many key businesses, corporations and outdoor venues, this hotel is within walking distance to 10 restaurants and a variety of shops. Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville was developed by Superhost Enterprise, and will be managed by Kana Hotel Group. 
"With its upscale contemporary design and the renowned brand offerings and service experience of the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand, this beautiful new hotel is a wonderful addition to the city of Naperville," said John Rogers, global head, Embassy Suites by Hilton. "Like all of our hotels, the unique combination of two-room suites, free made-to-order breakfast and complimentary evening drinks* and snacks will appeal strongly to business travelers as well as families, groups and couples staying for leisure." 
Located 28 miles from Chicago-O’Hare International Airport and 25 miles from Chicago Midway International Airport, the hotel offers convenient access to both airports. Easily accessible from I-88, Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville offers an excellent central location close to the Naperville Riverwalk, an area boasting brick pathways, beautiful fountains, bridges, artwork and celebratory monuments. Other nearby areas of interest include indoor skydiving with iFly Chicago Naperville and Naper Settlement – a family-friendly outdoor museum featuring 12 acres of learning and interactive opportunities for all ages. Morton Arboretum and Centennial Beach are also easily accessible from the hotel. 
Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville features more than 13,000 sq. ft. of flexible meeting and banquet space that can accommodate up to 1,000 guests – the largest of any venue in Naperville. This includes two board rooms and a private dining room with seating for up to 60 people. To help ensure any size event – including weddings – is successful, the hotel also offers onsite catering and state-of-the-art audio visual services. 
“We’re very pleased to add this outstanding hotel, which is our second in the Chicago area, to our growing portfolio of Hilton Worldwide properties,” said Alpesh Patel, CEO of Kana Hotel Group. “This is our fifth Embassy Suites by Hilton, and we currently have more under development.” 
The hotel also features Brickstones Grill, a concept created by Hilton Worldwide for the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand. Brickstones Grill offers a contemporary experience that seamlessly transitions made-to-order breakfast to a-la-carte for lunch or dinner in its sophisticated and contemporary open design kitchen. Exclusive to the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand, Brickstones Grill's menu features classic American fare – served in single or family portions – with some dishes cooked in the brick pizza oven, open pit fire grill or rotisserie. 
In addition to the free made-to-order breakfast, guests will enjoy a range of signature brand amenities at Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville including a two-hour complimentary Evening Reception* and two-room suites with a separate living area, private bedroom, two flat-screen high-definition televisions and wet bar fitted with a microwave, mini-fridge and a selection of gourmet coffee and teas from The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf®. The hotel also offers complimentary Wi-Fi throughout all guest rooms and public areas. Guests will also enjoy complimentary access to the hotel’s heated indoor pool, 24-hour fitness center featuring state-of-the-art equipment from Precor and 24-hour business center. 
”Embassy Suites by Hilton is synonymous with hospitality and guest satisfaction, and we’re very excited about this project,” said Ash Lakany, CEO Superhost Enterprises. “This hotel is a wonderful addition to the Naperville market, along with our three other properties under development in the Chicago area.” 
Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville participates in Hilton HHonors, the award-winning guest-loyalty program. Hilton HHonors members who book directly through preferred Hilton channels have access to benefits including digital check-in and choose your room. Additionally, Gold members will enjoy the option of receiving 500 bonus points per stay or two complimentary refreshments. Diamond members will enjoy 1,000 bonus points per stay or the choice of three refreshments. To celebrate the opening of the hotel and its large event and meeting spaces, HHonors members can earn double Event Planner points for any events booked throughout 2015 and 2016. 
Embassy Suites by Hilton Chicago-Naperville is located at 1823 Abriter Court, Naperville, Illinois, 60563.
